title: A Tale of Love and Darkness 2015 Israeli 1280x720 AAC Makalakato
description:
A drama based on the eponymous memoir (published in 2002) of Amos Oz, an Israeli writer, journalist, and advocate of a two-state solution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
A story about the childhood of Oz in Jerusalem and his youth in the Kibbutz during the British Mandate at the end of the 1940s. The plot describes the relationship between young Oz to his mother, his first steps as a writer, the emergence of the State of Israel and War of Independence.


Director: Natalie Portman
Writers: Natalie Portman (screenplay), Amos Oz (memoir)
Stars: Natalie Portman, Makram Khoury, Shira Haas, Gilad Kahana, Neta Riskin, Mor Cohen, Aliza Ben-Moha
Genres: Biography | Drama | History
Country: Israel
Duration: 1:33:17
Language: Hebrew


Subtitles: Hebrew (hardcoded) and Russian (softcoded). 
No English subs yet. But I don't understand Hebrew neither Russian, and had the sensation I was understanding every scene on ecran. Guess you should try
